readable.title: 2192802444_b14bb87b95
readable.content: a group of mostly nude children playing on a bridge over some water . A group of young boys , one naked , play around a rickety bridge . Children climbing and standing on a wooden bridge over water . People walking on an old wooden bridge over the water , one of them is a toddler , while others play under the bridge There are naked children playing on a wood bridge .
